## üéØ Purpose of This PR

This Pull Request introduces one and only one Layer-1 Epistemic Analysis Record.

The objective is to:

- Perform controlled epistemic evaluation
- Compare hypotheses without asserting physical truth
- Map constraints, evidence boundaries, and uncertainty
- Produce internal analytical artefacts only

This PR does not introduce models, simulations, or executable logic.
